Elizabeth N. Blackmore and James O. Lloyd-Smith (2024) 'Transoceanic pathogen transfer in the age of sail and steam', Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, 121(30). Available at: https://doi.org/10.1073/pnas.2400425121.

title: Home
text:
I am a graduate student in Ecology and Evolutionary Biology at Yale University, where I am advised by Brandon Ogbunu. I use theoretical and quantitative ecology to study the global history of infectious disease.
I completed a Master of Science in Biology at UCLA, where I was advised by James Lloyd-Smith (Ecology and Evolutionary Biology) and by Benjamin Madley (History). I completed undergraduate training in History at the University of Cambridge. I also hold a Master of Arts in History from the University of Durham.
